name: Windows Manage Trojanize Support Account
author: salcho <salchoman@gmail.com>
description:
This module enables alternative access to servers and workstations
        by modifying the support account's properties. It will enable
        the account for remote access as the administrator user while
        taking advantage of some weird behavior in lusrmgr.msc. It will
        check if sufficient privileges are available for registry operations,
        otherwise it exits.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: PASSWORD
options.description: Password of the support user account

options.name: GETSYSTEM
options.description: Attempt to get SYSTEM privilege on the target host.
